title: Fire Forest Status schema
description: This entity describes the possible presence of fire in a forest.

smokeDetected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of smoke detected by cameras.

fireDetected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Boolean'. Presence of a fire detected by cameras.

fireRiskIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Possible risk of fire

fireWeatherIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Risk of fire based on weather conditions.

fireForesDailyRiskIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Dailiy risk of fire.
